data.eml:eml: Beta-tubulin and Actin gene phylogeny supports Phaeoacremoniumovale as a new species from freshwater habitats in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Shi-Ke, Jeewon, Rajesh, Hyde, Kevin D., Bhat, D. Jayarama, Putarak Chomnunti,, Wen, Ting-Chi (2018): Beta-tubulin and Actin gene phylogeny supports Phaeoacremoniumovale as a new species from freshwater habitats in China. MycoKeys 41: 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.41.27536, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.41.27536
